attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that the new logo is unpopular with the public.  Over 84% of the 4000+ voters on the BBCs website don't like it.  The BBCs 606 message board is swamped with people expressing their dislike (only a few hours after the launch) and I feel this should be brought to the attention of the Government.

If you really want young people involved in the Olympics, why not hold a competition and a public vote?  The BBC could put it on their website.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
